saveGame() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.GECLYfinalproj.Engine
Saves the game-state by using the FileManager to record the Engine.grid, and other miscellaneous attributes like Engine.turnCount.
setPos(int, int) - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.GECLYfinalproj.Grid
This method sets the object located at set of coordinates.
setupGrid() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.GECLYfinalproj.Engine
This method instantiates the Grid object for a new game.

This method will print a method in the console.
startGame() - Static method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.GECLYfinalproj.UserInterface
This method starts the game and is called from the Main method.
SWIFT - Variable in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.GECLYfinalproj.ConsoleInterface
